document.full_text: four united states soldiers have been killed in iraq in recent days, two from enemy attack and two from what the american military called a 'non-hostile incident' in the north.
document.title: middle east: iraq: 4 u.s. soldiers killed in iraq
lines_and_colors: four united states soldiers have been killed in iraq in recent days, two from enemy attack and two from what the american military called a 'non-hostile incident' in the north.
